plot: Voice-actress Dong-joo has a terrible weakness: she sings horribly. Yet in an effort to win the heart of her old high-school crush, she agrees to sing solo in a wedding. It falls on voice coach Shin-hong to help her, or die trying.
title: Umchi keulreonik
plot_es: Voice-actress Dong-joo has a terrible weakness: she sings horribly. Yet in an effort to win the heart of her old high-school crush, she agrees to sing solo in a wedding. It falls on voice coach Shin-hong to help her, or die trying.
plot_en: Voice-actress Dong-joo has a terrible weakness: she sings horribly. Yet in an effort to win the heart of her old high-school crush, she agrees to sing solo in a wedding. It falls on voice coach Shin-hong to help her, or die trying.
